Thank you Bill Wurtz. True man of action.

9.17.17  11:18 pm   bill, it's almost halloween, please do not work on holidays, like christmas and other things. i understand that you want to finish your work as quickly as possible (thanks) but DO NOT WORK ON HOLIDAYS. we want you to live your life. not on holidays please bill!

     if i'm gonna take days off, what's so special about those days?

9.17.17  11:00 pm   why the huge ass questions recently? i get that you want to help this man while he's in a rut, but sheesh it gets to the point where it takes up almost half the window and two times my phone screen

     i've always answered a variety of different types of questions, and i will continue to do so, in the future

9.17.17  10:02 pm   9.17.17  11:38 am why use 2nd inversions for F and G?

     it's usually common sense to keep all your notes in the same range. it's like 3 people having a conversation, they just talk from where they are standing. they don't all have to switch places so the person speaking is always facing the same direction

     that's not true, but i respect your opinion

     no

9.17.17  4:43 pm   9.16.17  3:39 pm    What's the difference between good words and bad words?

     all words are bad

Why do you say, that the words are bad?

     that was in response to a question asking to make a distinction between "good" words and "bad" words, which is a question i had a hard time taking seriously, so i said "all words are bad." that's just me having a little fun here on the questions page

9.17.17  4:04 pm   Why do people use the word "cancer" to describe videos on the internet that are really bad?

     perhaps it's a metaphor, for something that's really bad and might cause death

9.17.17  3:46 pm   I was wondering if it's still possible to see all of your vines somewhere? Now that Vine has gone away, it seems it only shows the most popular ones.

     i actually thought vine was gone, but recently i wanted to link to my "Q train" video, and wanted the looping version, so i went to vine and it looks like all the videos are still there, in the original uploaded order. but maybe i'm wrong. regardless, every video i made for vine was first made in wide screen, as a regular video, and posted on my website and youtube. so every video can still be found in those 2 locations, even though it maybe a different aspect ratio, a few seconds longer, and may not auto-loop. aside from that, i still have all the square vine versions, and i'm considering making a page on this site that for all the vine versions

9.17.17  3:25 pm   Hi, I'm the Pandora person. So I actually read through their 25 page manual and everything they had on their website about music submissions, and it seems like your music is more likely to be accepted if you submit it through one of their "direct deal partners." Obviously that is not ideal, but it might be the only way to get your music on there. If you have already submitted your music through one of their partners, I don't really know what else you can do other than wait it out.

     any chance you wanna help me find out who those partners are?

9.17.17  2:39 pm   Hello, my name is Jeff Caan. I don't know if you like posting questions where people say there names,  but in this case, I don't mind. You have my permission. My name has caused me a lot of annoyance over the years. With my last name being "Caan" I've had to deal with SO many people yelling "Khaaaaaaaaaaan!" (like from Star Trek), also, I've lost count of the times where I've had to tell people that no, I am not Shao Kahn from Mortal Kombat or Shere Khan from Jungle Book. I'm also not related to James Caan or Madeline Kahn. And in the past couple of years, I don't think I need to tell you how people react whenever I say "My name is Jeff.".... I would like to use your question page as an opportunity to give a PSA to all those who read these questions. DO NOT MAKE JOKES ABOUT SOMEBODY'S NAME. THEY HAVE HEARD THE JOKE BEFORE COUNTLESS TIMES. YOU ARE NOT ORIGINAL, AND THEY DO NOT THINK IT IS FUNNY. If somebody's name is Jesse don't say "Ha! Tha t's a gi rls name!" If somebody's name is Duncan, don't call them "Duncan Donuts". If somebody's name is Richard, yes, they know that Dick is short for Richard and that dick can mean penis. If somebody's shares the same last name as a celebrity or a character from a tv show/movie/book, don't ask them if they are related to that person/character. If somebody's first and last name rhyme or if they have "two first names", you don't have to point that out for them. They know.

9.17.17  2:09 pm   Would you ever release an actual song of your "hi, i'm steve" video sometime in the future? It's really catchy and oddly motivating. Thanks!

     the song already is actual, in the video. but i respect your opinion

9.17.17  2:05 pm   if 8th-notes are "1&2&" how do you prefer to count 16th-notes out loud? 

     i use the 1e&a2e&a system, although it's not really used for actually counting consecutive 16th notes, it's more like an address system, to refer to a point in time. like you might tell your trumpet players to play the hit "on the e of 2" that means it's the second 16th note of beat 2. similar to how you might say "on the & of 2" which would mean halfway in between beat 2 and 3

9.17.17  1:47 pm   WHY DON'T YOU USE CAPS?

     why don't you notice when i do

     you could try using them sometimes, it would seem unusual, and being unusual is a part of your online personality isn't it?

     by the way, why don't you use any capital letters?

9.17.17  1:01 pm   "of what" - I will explain. The font size font color and font font of the questions and answers on your questions page on your website - do you think you would ever change them?

     there is no set font. so it is your choice whether to change them. the colors i did set, and i will not change them because i think i set them the right way the first time. actually that's not true, i adjusted the purple very slightly after about 2 months, because someone told me they thought it was too dim. but after that change, i think i got it right

9.17.17  12:36 pm   I saw your harmony tip of don't play chords in the bass? Do you mean don't play chords below a certain register, or don't play full chords with your left hand? Cause a lot of times when I play piano I do chords with my left, melody with my right. Should I break this habit?

     don't play chords below a certain register. but the whole reason is because it doesn't sound good, so if you think it sounds good then great news you don't have to obey this rule

9.17.17  12:08 pm   I have a lot of music written. Some of its fully recorded, some it's partially recorded, some it's just written out in paper. But, I have a good solid base of stuff to go off of. But right now, I'm stuck in a MAJOR rut. Like, what do I do with all this music? The logical thing I think would be pairing music with videos, graphics, or some kind of visual aspect. But the thing is, I've never really felt the "calling" of being a video-maker. It's not really something I'm passionate about at all, in the same way I am about making music... and if im not passionate about it, why even do it? Even if I do decide to at least try making videos, I have no experience in it and wouldn't even know where to begin... Also, I feel like just making videos for the sake of pairing something up with my music isn't a good strategy since it would just be like forcing 2 things together instead of creating something with sound and visuals together that go hand and hand as pa rt of a whole. I have some songs that I think can stand alone, like more traditional verse/chorus stuff with vocals... but most of my stuff is like weird little instrumental pieces, like 10 seconds to a minute in length, which I don't think would make much sense on their own (when I wrote them I had certain images in mind, like this song reminds me of a mad scientists tinkering with a bunch of test-tubes and bubbling chemicals, this song sounds like you just got "game over" in a video game, this song sounds like you just had an idea and a light bulb went off over your head, this song sounds like your taking a walk and then something crazy jumps out in front of you, this one sounds like you tried to do something epic but then failed in an anticlimactic way at the very end, etc)... sorry for this long rambling text. But I just feel like I've been standing in front of the same hurdle for a very long time and have no ideas how to jump over it and it's disheartening. If you have any advi ce for m e, I'd really appreciate it. Like should I just force myself to try to learn how to make videos, and hope that over time I learn to enjoy it, get better at it, and find my own voice/style? Or should I seek alternate routes (which routes, I don't know) that don't involve me making videos? 

     well, if you really don't want to find any way to make videos but you feel like the material has to go with something visually (which i think is probably right) then you might consider finding someone else who wants to make the videos. or, another approach would be to find people that make videos and they are looking for music, and you could write music to their videos. neither of these options work for me because i am a control freak and i live under a rock. but because of that, i knew i had no choice but to learn how to make the videos myself. but if you don't want to do that you might try to explore some collaborative options

9.17.17  11:41 am   5.27.17  11:40 pm Why?

     i guess the other person didn't love me as much as i thought

9.17.17  11:38 am   how does one C Major

     use the notes C, D, E, F, G, A, B, C. and maybe C, E, G at the same time, or C, F, A at the same time, or D, G, B at the same time. experiment a little and you will surely find other groups of notes in this set that work at the same time. and maybe even learn some of your favorite songs, using this note set

9.17.17  11:35 am   why do you do things that your audience won't expect?

     to keep it interesting

9.17.17  11:17 am   how long does it usually take you to pick your
outfit of the day

     about 4 seconds

     make friends with the judges

     about what

9.17.17  6:23 am   bill, you've been in a coma for 5 years now.

Please wake up, we miss you

9.17.17  4:36 am   vulgarness is bad, isn't it?

     it's supposed to be

9.17.17  4:05 am   i didn't mean that one hour long play script is one of the small steps. it's not a huge step for me but it definitely was a critical step that would help me take bigger steps forward. and i have no idea how i managed to do it either. after i took your advice  i thought "this is what i want to do, this is what i do best, what stops me? i can't take doing nothing anymore." and i started to note every little and crazy idea for anything, being reckless about if it's perfect for other people's standards. i travelled and wrote poems in those places. i tried to play guitar for the first time in years, it seems i need to dust off my old skills but ... i wrote lyrics, i guess? i had many, many, many fiction ideas for novels and i gained experience for non-fiction.  and i did everything on a small scale. THEN i jumped in at the deep end by accepting a task, which is this play. in fact i was going to refuse but i had to accept, 'they' made m e. the m ain theme they gave to me was very common, but safe and i was given enough time to write. for like a week i didn't even start, i didn't think about it and then i remembered and i said "okay, you know what, fuck this. they want me to do what everyone else does. i'll give them and the audience the theme they want, but i'll do it my way." and i started to write nonstop, contextualizing the subject in a way no one ever dared before. i didn't care, i was just writing and soon i realized it's finished in just eight hours. because of this success i was feeling confident, i sent them the script saying "listen to me, i am your only chance to put this play on the stage in time, here is my script, i know it's crazy but i also know it's good, accept it or accept it, i won't be directing anything other than this." politely. and they LOVED it, i must admit that i was surprised. the play will be staged three months later (which is also a short time like eight hours for a play but i'll handle it) and i might do voice acting. i'm sure they will cut out the best scenes 'because it's not appropriate' but doesn't matter. the important thing is i have the original script i have written and one day i will be able to revive it the way i want. after the play is performed i'll continue with small but fast steps because i still don't feel ready to run, just like i said before it's just the beginning. so here comes the questi on, is m y situation somehow similar to how you started doing your contents?

     no, i was never able to make connections with other people, and in turn i learned never to have to rely on others to complete my work

      and what do you think about how my improvement is going?

     overwhelmingly spectacular

      it's important for me to know, you were the only person i told my problems on writing and this drowning in infinity thing.

9.17.17  3:45 am   What do you think about 2016?

     it seems like everyone hated it. which is interesting because now everyone thinks they liked it, and hate this year instead
